content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences or opinions, but Pacifika Eco Tourism offers a range of tours and activities that focus on Fijian culture. Their cultural immersion tours include the "Suva City Walking Tour," where visitors can explore the city's cultural landmarks and historical sites, and the "Fijian Culinary Experience," which provides an opportunity to learn about traditional Fijian cooking methods and sample local cuisine. Additionally, they offer "Village Homestay Experiences," where visitors can immerse themselves in the local community, participate in traditional activities such as fishing, weaving, or dancing, and learn about Fijian culture firsthand. The homestays are with local families in various villages around Suva, and visitors can choose from a range of activities, depending on their interests. They also offer workshops on traditional crafts, such as mat weaving, tapa making, and woodcarving. You can visit their website or contact them directly to find out more about their cultural tours and activities.
